Replace.Text: Recalling Heroes costs 15% less [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Patronage of Great People costs 25% less [ICON_Faith] Faith. [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations provide an extra 10% of the Science and Culture cost for researching technologies and civics. Districts in this city provide +2 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person points of their type (for example, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points from the Theater Square district). Must be built on Hills.
All Hero units have 10% longer [ICON_Lifespan] Lifespans. Increases growth by 25% in all cities. Must be built next to a River.

所有英雄单位的 [ICON_Lifespan] 寿命+10%。所有城市人口增长加速25%。必须建在河流旁。
